subtitle: Hello everyone this is Gene and welcome back to Astral Doorway
if you're not yet a subscriber to the channel and if you're interested in Astral projection
and in particular want to learn how to do it for yourself then please go ahead and subscribe as
there will be hundreds of videos covering many and any subjects of the topic in the years to
come, also i want to thank everyone who bought my book beyond dreaming from amazon i really hope
you're enjoying it if you're interested in it i released a video talking a bit about that
a few days ago i want to apologize if there's any typos if you bought the paperback version
when it just came out um i guess you guys have the more authentic version of it you could say
since then it's been updated on amazon and if you have the ebook version
and not yet read the book then i believe the latest version should have automatically been
updated on your device and if not you may have to turn on automatic updates on your ebook i'll leave
a link in the description for that but if you have any problems you know just ask and if you enjoy
the book of course i'd be very grateful if you left a review on amazon so i wanted to cover a bit
about the different ways of communicating in the astral since quite a few of you have asked me
about psychic abilities such as clairvoyance for example, you see communication in the astral
is not so similar to the way we communicate in the physical, you see in the physical
uh due to its sort of density its denseness you know, it's like there's a thicker cloud of
fog between us in the physical right we're always struggling to hear each other right there's always
miscommunications and misunderstandings and these misunderstandings are amplified even more in the
physical when individuals are very asleep right? very unconscious and stuck in their heads, you know
we've all met people like that right it's easy to tell when someone is more cut off from their being
um when they make completely no effort to really listen to you or they come across very inauthentic
or fake as most would say, so yeah that's what it's like in the physical right? things are often
lost in translation and we're always guessing what everyone's saying or what everyone means
so even though there's this difficulty in communication, if one is somewhat awakened
to certain internal abilities or occurrences you could say, one starts to go beyond just
spoken language and picks up on information that in essence derive from the astral and you know
they perceive these things while in the physical, we call these people psychics right so yeah in the
astral things are significantly different in the sense that there isn't this sort of fog between
people, in contrast communication can often be very clear cut to the point where too much information
can get leaked out from a person things about people are more clear and obvious messages
come through so much more faster and with more precision and clarity assuming that the receiver
is paying attention properly, communication is so efficient there i mean it's not always 100%
efficient all the time but it can be so efficient that it doesn't always require words, things are
more naked so to speak uh they're more revealing if you pay attention which is a lot easier to do
in the astral and these abilities or ways of communication that we can learn in the astral
can be bridged into the physical; these abilities. if you're interested in that kind of thing you
can make conscious efforts to understand it in the astral you can practice it in the physical
but honestly if you can start astral projecting and practice it in the astral you will get such
a better feel for what it means and how it feels and once you then go into the physical you will
instinctively know how to practice it because you would have already done it properly in the astral
so yes, for example in the astral if someone is talking to you you may not just hear words
but you may also actually see the scenes and images that the person is talking about
as they speak, in reality this is what we call clairvoyance and also clairaudience
and clairsentience, so you know those so-called psychic powers can be realized and bridged from
practicing astral projection, i say so-called uh because you know the word psychic has a lot of
connotations to it right? but when in reality when you start to understand these things there
you realize it's just natural it's just part of your being and you realize it's a more natural
way to communicate, and in reality you may realize that you already somewhat do this sometimes we
say to people or we think that we get a good impression about people right? we
say that they're a good judge of character or we say oh i guess that person was
like that oh you know we get impressions about a person or we meet someone and you know we
just know whether we're gonna like that person or not you know ignoring superficial judgments about
what they're wearing or something, sometimes you just know or feel certain things about a person
before you've even started communicating so let me give a few examples of what i'm talking about
starting with clairvoyance; one time in the astral i visited a cinema, a movie theater, and i
went in and sat down on the back row but instead of being interested in what was on the screen
i noticed there were only a few people inside so i looked over at a man sitting down in the middle
row who was watching the screen now i simply just gazed at him and as i did i noticed little images
start to float all around him i could visually see things about his life; i saw his little grey-haired
shabby dog walking around, i could see his nice house, i could see cigarettes, and that he was a
smoker, and i saw people from his family, and so these were things about this man's life
his world and things that he was sort of thinking about, and as i was noticing all this
he suddenly turned around and looked at me i realized that i may have been a bit too nosey so i left
this is also a kind of example of how people can also feel you sensing things about them
but you know that effect isn't just in the astral right? i've had it happen where in the physical
as i'm sure some of you have experienced this that when you're looking at someone in the physical and
sort of thinking or sensing things about them they suddenly just turn around and
look straight in your eyes right? when they could have looked at anything else
if you've not experienced that before try it next time when you're
out and about you know please let me know if you've experienced that down in the comments so
yeah this is one example of clairvoyance you can literally see visual things about a person now
in the physical this happens in the form of receiving visual mental impressions as you focus
on someone or talk to them we often experience this all the time unconsciously actually
but you know most of us aren't aware of our thoughts never mind spontaneous mental impressions
so it's also a matter of having your awareness receptive and present enough to notice them it's
a skill we can all develop now i have a couple of slightly amusing examples of clairaudience
in one experience i found myself in a family's home, in the home the family
members were all excited and were celebrating the fact that they were getting some new kittens
however when i looked at their current cat, their adult cat, i could feel that he wasn't happy
i asked him what was wrong and he said in plain english "i don't like the way humans are i like
you though you're simple others should be like that" i felt bad for him and asked him
why he wasn't happy they would gain kittens he said "i'm just not happy they're getting kittens"
i asked him why though but he didn't explain and just continued on in his mood as cats do
in another experience involving a cat i was walking down a street when i came across a
stray cat i knew he was stray simply by looking at him i said "hello" and he again in plain english
said hello back he was looking at a group of people across the road and he said to me
"look at those people over there" i said "yes what about them" he said "humans are pets not cats"
i was surprised by what he said and asked him what he meant by that but in the typical way of
a snobby cat he turned his back on me uninterested i then realized what he meant of course you
know he was a stray and like many strays he probably had a collection of local human pets
that he would probably use for food and shelter so even though you may hear plain english in
these telepathic communications it's not always necessary but you can see here how communicating
to an animal who doesn't usually have the facility to speak human language in the physical can still
convey their communication in a way that suits our own human perception or at least that's how we
interpret it through this sort of universal astral translation, okay so it's like you know for animals
they don't use language but we can hear them in our own language similarly when we speak to
humans who know language but we can hear their communications, you know through other ways that
on through, spoken language and another form of that is through clairaudience so this is you know
an example of clairaudience and clairaudience in the physical is experienced through
hearing things, you know, hearing extra sensory audio when we're talking to someone for example
you might offer someone food and you mentally hear their answer before they say it or you
can just hear the thoughts of others randomly if you focus on them so this is very similar to how
clairvoyance works, and again of course there's also the matter of discerning whether you're
hearing your own subconscious thoughts or actual thoughts of other people so clairaudience and
clairvoyance have similarities in the sense that they are sense perceptions in your consciousness
that you can notice if you're receptive enough to them however clairsentience is a little more
subtle it's it's best described as telepathy because unlike clairaudience and clairvoyance
you feel the message instantaneously it's a lot more faster i gave one such example of this in
the video i shared about when i met the priestess in the temple who was doing an astral class
i'll put the link for the video on the screen now for that if you haven't heard it, and when i first
went into that temple she let me know that it was a basic spiritual teaching for the public
now she didn't say it in any sort of spoken language she didn't give me any visuals or audio
information she just looked at me in the eyes and communicated it and i received and acknowledged
the information that was transmitted it was just like that, now in the physical this ability
is experienced when we meet or see new people and we get impressions or feelings about them right?
more direct ways of this is also expressed through the eyes you know through the eyes
you can see if a person likes or dislikes what you're saying or if they're not interested or not
listening or if they're thinking about something else or you know if they just don't like you
there's a lot of things we can understand about people through their eyes alone if you know how to
interpret it so through all these ways of communication in the astral you can see how
because these non-physical dimensions are less dense there's a sort of
universal real time auto translation system that gets information communicated
effectively no matter what or who you are or what you're doing it doesn't even matter if
you don't speak the same language and you can even communicate with plants, actually
in native american shamanism this is how what they call 'medicine men' got their remedies for certain
ailments this is how many healers from antiquity came to find their potions and remedies you know
people would come to them with an illness and if they didn't know how to heal it they said you know
come back in a few days and then these healers would go out into nature or you know just
astral project, they would leave their body and they would investigate what plants they would need
to heal this person and then they would wake up and they would bridge this sort of
medicine dream you could call it, by finding the plants that they need and you know in those astral
experiences they were profound experiences where they would essentially communicate with the plants
sometimes even turn into the plants and or merge with them in a sort of powerfully intimate form of
you know clearsentience essentially, so it's important to note as well i've not made
any conscious efforts to develop these things specifically i never even had an interest
for it and generally i still don't but you can see how great astral projection is right because
i understand these things simply from experiencing astral projection; the astral plane is a place
where you can come to realize many psychic things like this because they are just a natural
byproduct of our innate abilities really and realizing them is a natural product of meditation
and astral projection yeah but with that said there are a few things you can do to help yourself
with these abilities if you're interested uh just a bit of advice from what i've noticed
has seemed to help me or things that i've practiced in the physical in meditation
and then have gone on to have experiences in the astral where i've realized that because i did
this practice i've just had an experience that was you know deeply in clairaudience or clairvoyance
i can perhaps go into more detail about all of this in the future but here's a few things you
can do if you want to practice these things so all of these tips are heavily reliant on meditation so
you have to be somewhat sufficient in meditation first; so for clairvoyance do meditation
in the way of noticing the darkness behind your eyelids for extended periods of time
focus on this darkness the visual darkness without wavering your attention you know most of us sit in
meditation close our eyes and we're not actually paying attention to the darkness there because
we're not that present we're still going off in sort of dream worlds in our imagination
so through visually paying attention even though there's nothing interesting to see
you will after time notice hypnagogic imagery or colors swirling around in your vision, that happens
when you meditate for long periods, a lot of you will have experienced that before and then in the
astral when you communicate with someone focus on them visually and just simply try to intend to see
what they're thinking or what they're speaking about to you that's really it you know focusing on
visual aspects, and a similar thing goes for claire audience too in long periods of meditation
focus on noticing silence you know our awareness is always trying to listen to sounds right but you
know when's the last time you actually noticed and listened to silence and within noticing silence
pure audio from your ears for long periods of time in a sort of silent meditation
you'll also start hearing things hypnagogic audio and you know when you're in meditation and you're
hearing these things you still just carry on your practice you don't become immersed with them or
fascinated by them you just simply hear them you hear these extrasensory perceptions this helps
with clear audience greatly you can also look into Shabd Yoga which is all about listening to our
inner sounds and that's also a method for astral projection i'll leave a link in the description
below for that if you're interested in Shabd Yoga which has a lot of resources to it if you
do the research as well and then also once you're in the astral you can try and find an animal or
a plant and focus on just hearing them mentally you can also talk to them out loud or mentally
and for clairsentience you have to be in touch with your own emotions and feelings in order to
feel others right so to develop this you should do meditations on focusing on being in your body
so you know there are meditations out there for body awareness, after all emotions are the body
and how the body feels there is a lot of intelligence in the body, you may have seen
the interesting facts about what science has found that there are many neurons in the gut as well as
the heart as they are essentially brain neurons; thinking neurons and actually there is research
to suggest that the heart is somewhat more intelligent or wiser or a more core part of
ourselves because the heart sends more signals to the brain than the brain sends to the heart
so that means that our hearts have more influence over our lives than our brain does in the sense
of decision making and feelings and stuff like that and the gut from my experience is one of the
faster ways we can get impressions about other people - you may have met someone new before and
you just got a very strong gut feeling right and you know as people say in their common tongue you
know a manifestation of our spoken language a lot of us say "follow your gut" or "follow your heart"
okay so that's it three practices one is meditating for prolonged periods
on visual imagery for clairvoyance another is on sounds for clairaudience
and the other is on body awareness meditation for clairsentience* and as you
strengthen in your practice you can eventually encompass all three aspects in your awareness
simultaneously which will propel you into more profound states of consciousness
both while you're awake and when you're in the astral okay, so let me know what you think if you
want to support the channel there's a link for the Patreon below all patreons can listen to episodes
early along with various other benefits thanks for listening and see you on the astral plane
